YouWillNotBeAbleToUseNameGen: You will not be able to use the name generator if the template is empty.
NameGenExplanation: You can use the following main placeholders here: 's' means syllable; 'v' means single vowel; 'V' means vowel or vowel combination. 'c' means single consonant, 'B' single constant for beginning of a word, 'C' single consonant for the end of a word. The algorithmus is based on the description of RinkWorks. You can find more information here and here.
NameGenFixErrorInTemplateBeforeSaving: You have to fix the error in the template before being able to save it.
Name: Name
DropImageHere: Drop image for npc here or click to choose an image
AreYouSureYouWantToRemoveTheItem: Are you sure you want to remove the item?
AreYouSureYouWantToRemoveTheSkill: Are you sure you want to remove the skill?
PleaseSaveToEditDailyRoutine: Please save the npc to edit the daily routine.
AreYouSureYouWantToRemoveTheEvent: Are you sure you want to remove the event?
TimeEventsOverlap: There are active events that overlap. The daily routine might not be predictable.
TheNpcHasNoMarkerInAnyMap: The npc is not marked in any map. It is recommended to mark the npc in a map before adding movement targets.
ThereAreInvalidSnippets: There are invalid snippets because the associated placeholders have been deleted from the template. They will not be exported.
NoExportSnippetExist: No export snippets exist for this object. You have to add export snippets to the template using the export snippets placeholders to use this function.
DeleteSnippetToolTip: Click here to delete the snippet
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheExportSnippe: Are you sure you want to delete the export snippet?
AreYouSureYouWantToExportUnsavedChanges: There are unsaved changes. The export will reflect an old state. Are you sure you want to export the old state?
MarkedInMapNTimes: Npc is marked in the map {{0}} times. No zoom on marker is possible.
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheObject: Are you sure you want to delete the npc?
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteTheTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete the template?
AreYouSureYouWantToRegenerateTheLanguage: Are you sure you want to regenerate the language keys? This can be useful if the name of the object was changed for example.
DeletingThisTemplateWillAlsoDeleteExport: If you delete this template the associated export template will also be deleted. The npc default export template will be used in this case.
ExistingLanguageKeysWillChange: If the language keys are regenerated the existing keys can change. Existing translations might need to be changed.
AreYouSureYouWantToMarkTheNpcAsPlayer: Are you sure you want to mark the npc as the player?
LockedTemplatePrefix: The template is currently being edited by
LockedObjectPrefix: The npc is currently being edited by
